item.title: Support multiple Firebase projects in your Android app
item.description: Have you ever thought about create multiple environments in Android app? I’d got this question since I created my first Firebase project and finally I tried and found the answer these days. This artical is sharing how to make different variants to connect to different Firebase projects and switch them easily in Android projects. Let’s get it started Step 1: Name variants Firstable, give names for your variants. For instance, I have two variants and named them as development, release.
